meanings.sent1: Grandpa was the crankiest person in the house when he couldn't find his glasses.
meanings.sent2: She always gets crankiest when she's hungry.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked crankiest when it was woken up from its nap.
meanings.sent4: The old car made the crankiest noise when it started in the morning.
meanings.sent5: The crankiest customer at the store demanded to speak to the manager.

meanings.definition: Characterized by eccentricity or odd behavior
meanings.sent1: The crankiest house on the block had a garden full of plastic flamingos.
meanings.sent2: The artist's studio was the crankiest place I had ever seen, with paint splatters everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The crankiest scarecrow in the field wore a top hat and sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The clock in the tower had the crankiest chime, sounding like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The crankiest tree in the forest had branches that twisted in all directions.
